cz.ive.location
Interface GridArea

All Superinterfaces:
Area, Hook, IveId, IveObject, WayPoint
All Known Implementing Classes:
Area2DGrid
public interface GridArea
extends Area

Describing an area, where the contained WayPoints are always ordered in an two-dimensional grid.

Author:
pavel

Method Detail

setGrid

void setGrid(WayPoint[][] grid)
Sets the grid of WayPoints contained in that area.

Parameters:
grid - Waypoints contained by that area

getGrid

WayPoint[][] getGrid()
Gets the grid of WayPoints contained in that area.

Returns:
grid Waypoints contained by that area

getAt

WayPoint getAt(int x,
               int y)
Gets the WayPoint, which is situated in the geven coordinates relatively to that area. These coordinates have nothing together with realPosition, they determine the position in the area's grid.

Parameters:
x - First grid coordinate
y - Second grid coordinate
Returns:
WayPoint on grid coordinates x, y, or null if some index is out of bounds
